Type.Name: SwitchPageHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SwitchPageHandler(object o, SwitchPageArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed SwitchPageHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the SwitchPageHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the SwitchPageHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the SwitchPageHandler is removed from the event.
